backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no defined functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing implemented frontend changes for hero background removal and about-section image replacement.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each major frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH variable definitions for light/dark themes, applying base styles without hero background patterns.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML containing SEO and Open Graph metadata and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout composing navbar, all page sections, and footer in a single-page structure.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, submission simulation, error handling, and a success confirmation state.
Footer with brand info, quick links, services list, contact details, and social icons using smooth-scroll navigation.
Responsive navbar with smooth-scroll navigation, scroll-based styling, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section with descriptive text, qualifications list, and a square-framed profile image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact page section with contact details, icons, and a contact form component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Implements the hero banner with headline text and buttons that scroll to contact and services sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Highlig: Displays a grid of highlight items with icons and descriptions explaining key service advantages.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Shows a grid of service cards with icons and detailed descriptions of accounting and compliance services.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because the marketing site requires no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions, and typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata listing existing features and pending requests to remove frontâ€‘page background designs and replace an image in the About section.
